attributes.action: Full Pay for anyone Advised to self Isolate by 111.
attributes.additional_details:
That way people won't worry and self isolate which will help contain the virus.

People knowingly going out with Flu like symptoms because they don't have a choice because they have families that depend on them.

Because it will make sure families are not affected, one person could be off work but that one person could have 2/3 or even more people depending on that person.
attributes.background: I want the Government to back the people financially so that people wont be afraid to self isolate in fear of having financial difficulties.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301652

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
